text: Joseph E. "Joe" Dini, Jr. (March 28, 1929 - April 10, 2014) was an American politician for the Democratic Party and business man. He was elected to the Nevada State Assembly for the 38th district (which includes Lyon County, Storey County and parts of Carson City) in 1967 and served until 2001. He also owned the Dini's Lucky Club from 1960 until 2007. He was born in Yerington, Nevada. Dini died from heart failure after an illness on April 10, 2014 at a hosptial in Reno, Nevada. He was 85 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Joe Dini at the Nevada Legislature Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Nevada Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Disease-related deaths in Nevada Category:Politicians from Nevada Category:Writers from Nevada Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Joe Dini
